availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A Kentucky cabinetmaker and sheriff. Lived in Hardin County, Kentucky in 1860. Served as sheriff of Hardin County, Kentucky from 1864 to 1867.

bibl.p: "Hardin County Sheriff's," (http://www.hcky.org/hcso/History/Past_Sheriffs.htm) (accessed on March 28, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, 3rd District, p. 93; "James L. Hills," (https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=90448617&ref=acom) (accessed on March 28, 2017).
